message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $11,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $11,250.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm comfortable offering $10,750 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer the product to you for $11,500.

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $11,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to offer $11,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my budget and your need to make a reasonable profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob. However, I'm not ready to go as low as $11,000. I can offer the product to you for $11,750.
